texts: We're working to get our website back to normal but in the meantime here's some useful links:
{"title":"Help \u0026 contacts","texts":["See answers to frequently asked questions, useful links and contacts"],"link":{"url":"/help-and-contact/index","image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":true}
{"title":"Contact us","texts":["Send us your questions or feedback about Oyster"],"link":{"url":"/help-and-contact/contact-us-about-oyster","image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":true}

{"title":"Oyster card","texts":["What is an Oyster card and how can I use it?"],"link":{"url":"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go/oyster-pay-as-you-go","image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":true}

{"title":"Buying tickets and Oyster","texts":["Buy tickets and Oyster cards online and from places across London"],"link":{"url":"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/buying-tickets-and-oyster","image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":true}

{"title":"Touching in and out","texts":["Always touch in and out on a yellow card reader to pay the right fare for your travel"],"link":{"url":"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go/touching-in-and-out","image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":true}

{"title":"Card clash","texts":["Keep your contactless and Oyster cards separate when touching a yellow card reader"],"link":{"url":"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go/card-clash","image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":true}

{"title":"Maximum journey times","texts":["Keep within the maximum journey time when you're travelling so you don't pay more"],"link":{"url":"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go/keep-within-maximum-journey-times","image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":true}

{"title":"Touch a pink card reader","texts":["Pink card readers charge the right fare by showing us you didn't go through Zone 1"],"link":{"url":"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go/touch-pink-card-reader-when-changing-trains","image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":true}

{"title":"First-generation Oyster cards","texts":["Replace your first-generation Oyster card with a new one to use our free app"],"link":{"url":"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/tfl-oyster-and-contactless-app/first-generation-oyster-cards","image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":true}

{"title":"Free and discounted travel","texts":["Find out more about how you could get free and discounted travel"],"link":{"url":"/fares/free-and-discounted-travel","image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":true}

{"title":"Pay as you go caps","texts":["Make as many pay as you go journeys as you like and we'll cap your fare"],"link":{"url":"/fares/find-fares/tube-and-rail-fares/pay-as-you-go-caps","image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":true}
{"title":"Status updates","texts":["Check the status of the Tube, DLR and London Overground"],"link":{"url":"/status-updates/index","image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":true}
